identity.name: GetGeeky Codex
identity.metaphor: A classified digital vault of forbidden knowledge

headings.usage: All section titles, hero headers, and 'Daily Hit' numbers. Gives the 'Codex/Terminal' feel.

body.usage: All paragraph text, UI labels, and long-form content. Ensures maximum readability.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on the main background to prevent digital flatness.

layouts.spacing_scale: Relaxed. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards instead of p-4.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or minimal rounded-md (2px). No pill shapes.

cards.style: Flat dark surface (#121212) with 1px subtle border. Hover state: border color lightens, slight lift.
cards.daily_hit_card: Must use 'Tracing Beam' effect or a glowing top border to signify importance.

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-12

ai_unleashed.description: Futuristic robot head with glowing red triangle symbol. Use for AI category headers or cards.

dark_psychology.description: Black and white photo of a brain. Use for Psychology category.

conspiracy_vault.description: Glitching document with blue and yellow text. Use for Conspiracy category.

geek_science.description: A refrigerator in a room with neon lights (Cryo-chamber vibe). Use for Science category.

instructions_to_main_agent: FORCE DARK MODE: Ensure the 'dark' class is always applied to the html/body tag. Do not build a light mode toggle.
FONT INSTALLATION: Add 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Manrope' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS import.
NO GRADIENT TEXT: Do not use gradient text for headings. It looks cheap. Use solid white or off-white.
USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn UI components for all interactive elements (forms, dialogs, dropdowns) but style them to match the 'Digital Monolith' theme (remove rounded-xl, use rounded-md or square).
DAILY HIT UI: The 'Daily Hit' is the core feature. Make these cards look like 'Classified Files' or 'Data Packets'. Use a monospace font for the date/metadata.
ONBOARDING: The interest selection screen should feel like 'initializing a system'. Use toggle buttons that glow when selected.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
